body_html:
@martinwicke Thanks for the review. There was some confusion from my side before about the workflow. Now the PR has been updated with the following changes:
This PR:

  1. New kernel (SampleDistortedBoundingBoxV2Op) has been registered.
  2. SampleDistortedBoundingBoxV2 is hidden in python (tensorflow/python/ops/hidden_ops.txt)

Next PR (I will submit it after 3 weeks):

  1. SampleDistortedBoundingBox will be hidden in python (tensorflow/python/ops/hidden_ops.txt)
  2. An wrapper sample_distorted_bounding_box will be added in image_ops_impl.py and calls sample_distorted_bounding_box_v2.

Please take a look at the update PR and let me know if the above changes matches the API workflow.

body:
@martinwicke Thanks for the review. There was some confusion from my side before about the workflow. Now the PR has been updated with the following changes:
This PR:
1. New kernel (`SampleDistortedBoundingBoxV2Op`) has been registered.
2. `SampleDistortedBoundingBoxV2` is hidden in python (tensorflow/python/ops/hidden_ops.txt)

Next PR (I will submit it after 3 weeks):
1. `SampleDistortedBoundingBox` will be hidden in python (tensorflow/python/ops/hidden_ops.txt)
2. An wrapper `sample_distorted_bounding_box` will be added in `image_ops_impl.py` and calls `sample_distorted_bounding_box_v2`.

Please take a look at the update PR and let me know if the above changes matches the API workflow.
